price: ߊ߬ ߞߵߊ߬ ߝߏ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߞߊ߲߬ ߞߵߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߘߊߥߎ߲ߠߌ߲߫ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߓߊ߬؟
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمۡ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ālihatihim faqāla alā takulūna
